name: Song of Morus - Thumby version
description:
This minigame as part of Song of Morus series  is developed for a very small handheld console called Thumby. The little device's extreme small size and tight hardware spec makes it a absolute challenge for both gamers and developers. That's why i decided to buy this handheld and make a game for it. And I feel a great satisfaction when seeing my game somehow playable in such platform

The HTML version is an emulator version to share my creation, which emulates a raspberry pi clip running micropython. It runs slower comparing the real device. Also, firefox doesn't support sound, and incognito mode triggers error. It's recommanded to download this game into your Thumby through their Arcade platform

Gameplay
Up/Down : Move
./, : Enter
Auto shoot
